arabicText: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئْتَ بِـَٔايَةٍۢ فَأْتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Said	Firaun,	“If	you	have	come	with	a	sign,	
then	present	it	if	you	are	truthful!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bola:	Agar	tum	koi	nishāni	lekar	āaye	ho	to	
lāo	agar	sachche	ho

arabicText: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعْبَانٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	 Moosa	 put	 down	 his	 staff	 - it	
immediately	turned	into	a	visible	python.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Mūsā ne	apna	‘Asā	dāl	diya	woh	fauran	
ek	zāhir	azdahā ho	gaya

arabicText: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 putting	 his	 hand	 in	 his	 bosom,	
withdrew	 it	- so	 it	 shone	 brightly	 before	
the	beholders.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	apna	hāth	girebān	meiñ	dāl	kar	nikāla	
to	 woh	 dekhne	 waloñ	 	 ke	 sāmne	
jagmagāne	laga

arabicText: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَـٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Said	the	chieftains	of	Firaun’s	people,	“He	
is	really	an	expert	magician.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Qaum-e-fir'aun	 ke sardār	 bole	 yeh	 to	 ek	
ilm	wāla	jādu-gar	hai

arabicText: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُمْ ۖ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“He	 wishes	 to	 expel	 you	 all	 from	 your	
kingdom;	so	what	do	you	advise?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumheiñ	 tumhāre	 mulk	 se	 nikāla	 chāhta	
hai	to	tumhāra	kya	mashwara	hai.

arabicText: قَالُوٓا۟ أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرْسِلْ فِى ٱلْمَدَآئِنِ حَـٰشِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“Stop	him	and	his	brother,	and	
send	 announcers	 to	 the	 cities	 to	 gather	
people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	unheiñ		aur	unke	bhai	ko	thehra	aur	
shehron	 meiñ	 log	 jam’a	 karne	 wāle	 bhej	
de.

englishTranslationText: “To	bring	all	the	expert	magicians	to	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ke	 har	 Ilm	 wāle	 jādu-gar	 ko	 tere	 pās	 le	
āayeñ

arabicText: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرْعَوْنَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 magicians	 came	 to	 Firaun,	 and	
said,	 “Will	we	get	 some	 reward	if	we	 are	
victorious?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jādu-gar	 fir'aun	 ke	 pās	 āaye	 bole	
kuchh	 hameiñ	 in’ām	 mile	 ga	 agar	 hum	
ghalib	āayeñ

englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “Yes,	 and	 you	 will	 then	 become	
close	to	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bola:	Hāñ	 aur	 us	waqt	 tum	muqarrab	 ho	
jāoge	.

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُلْقِينَ
englishTranslationText: They	said,	“O	Moosa!	You	may	throw	first	- or	shall	we	be	the	first	to	throw?”
romanUrduTranslationText: Bole:	Aey	Mūsā!	ya	to	āap	dāleiñ	ya	hum	dālne	wāle	hoñ

arabicText: قَالَ أَلْقُوا۟ ۖ فَلَمَّآ أَلْقَوْا۟ سَحَرُوٓا۟ أَعْيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسْتَرْهَبُوهُمْ وَجَآءُو بِسِحْرٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “You	 throw”;	 when	 they	 threw,	 they	 cast	 a	 magic	 spell	 upon	 the	 people’s	 eyes	 and	
terrified	them,	and	they	brought a	great	magic
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kahā	tumhiñ	dālo	jab	unhoñ	ne	dāla	logoñ	ki	nigahoñ	par	jādu	kar	diya	aur	unheiñ	darā diya	aur	
bada	jādu	lāaye.

arabicText: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنْ أَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۖ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	inspired	Moosa	 that,	“Put	 forth	your	staff”;	it	immediately	began	swallowing	up	 their	
fabrications.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	ne	Mūsā ko	Waḥi farmayi	ke	apna	‘Asā	dāl	to	nagāh	Woh	unki	banawatoñ	ko	nigalne	
lagā

arabicText: فَوَقَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText: So	the	truth	was	proved	and	their	works	were	disproved.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	Haq	sābit	huwa	aur	unka	kām	bātil	huwa.

englishTranslationText: They	were	therefore	defeated	here	and	they	turned	back	humiliated
romanUrduTranslationText: To	yahāñ		woh	maghloob	pade	aur	zaleel	hokar	palte

englishTranslationText: And	the	magicians	were	obliged	to	fall	prostrate.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	yahāñ		woh	maghloob	pade	aur	zaleel	hokar	palte
